masterGrammar.rule: rule {NP option Prona - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/o head noun (optional PP after} NP = {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg (PP)} <NP head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - | these use DP rule "Pron" <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <NP head> = <Dem head> <NP head> = <Q head> <NP head> = <Num head> <NP head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - | so "which" not separate <PP head type stranded> = - | PP must have overt complement <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP | <PP head type partitive> = + <NP head type prefix poss> = - |can't be possessors <NP head type suffix poss> = - |can't be possessors <NP head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <NP head type comma> <= <PP head type comma> <NP option> = Prona

rule {NP option Pronb - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/o head noun (optional PP before)} NP = (PP) {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg} <NP head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - | these use DP rule "Pron" <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <NP head> = <Dem head> <NP head> = <Q head> <NP head> = <Num head> <NP head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - | so "which" not separate <PP head type stranded> = - | PP must have overt complement <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP | <PP head type partitive> = + <NP head type prefix poss> = - |can't be possessors <NP head type suffix poss> = - |can't be possessors <PP head type comma> = - <NP option> = Pronb
rule {NP option 0 - not possessed} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> = - <NP head possessor head agr person> = none <NP option> = 0

rule {NP option 0Asuf - not possessed, absolutive_suffix} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> = - <NP head possessor head agr person> = none <NP head type suffix case> = none | if absolutive, possessor required <NP option> = 0Asuf

rule {NP option 0Apre - not possessed, absolutive_prefix} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> = - <NP head possessor head agr person> = none <NP head type prefix case> = none | if absolutive, possessor required <NP option> = 0Apre

rule {NP option 0Esuf - not possessed, ergative_suffix} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> = - <NP head possessor head agr person> = none <NP head type suffix ergative> = - | if +, possessor required <NP option> = 0Esuf
